name: SensiSpark Relaxation Stress Relief Game
summary: Drift into a world of pure sensory relaxation with SensiSpark — a calming VR experience designed to soothe your senses and ease your mind. Explore peaceful, sensory-rich environments where gentle sounds, soft colors, and mindful interactions help you relax, de-stress, and restore balance. Whether you're watching waves, painting with light, or floating through the clouds, SensiSpark invites you to unwind and reconnect with calm.
